output.base:
`HZurich Vault` `iEscrow Deposit`

`iInitial Deposit for a specific value is three steps.`

`iFirst, generate escrow authrequest with deposit script`
`iSecond, confirm the escrow for that amount`
`iThird, re-execute the first command to make the deposit.`

`iFuture calls for the same value are single step.`

`isyntax:` zurich.deposit { usr:"", pwd:"", amt:"" }

`iFor questions, please see `zurich.help
